remarks: Slot 2 (group operation) of a semigroup as extensible structure is an associative operation on the base set.  (Contributed by AV, 13-Jan-2020.)  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: sgrpplusgaopALT $p |- ( G e. SGrp -> ( +g ` G ) assLaw ( Base ` G ) ) $.
